{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.09962v1", "title": "Static Magnetic Properties of Cryogel$^{\tiny{\circledR}}$ and
  Pyrogel$^{\tiny{\circledR}}$ at Low Temperatures and in High Magnetic Fields", "summary": "The static magnetic properties of the silica-based aergoels of
Cryogel$^{\tiny{\circledR}}$ and Pyrogel$^{\tiny{\circledR}}$, manufactured by
Aspen Aerogels$^{\tiny{\circledR}}$, were measured over a range of temperatures
(2 K $\leq$ T $\leq$ 400 K) and in magnetic fields up to 70 kG. These data and
a model of the responses are reported so these properties are familiar to
others who may benefit from knowing them before the materials are employed in
potential applications.", "main_category": "cond-mat.mtrl-sci", "categories": "cond-mat.mtrl-sci", "published": "2025-04-14T07:59:19Z"}
